        public void insertReservationInformation(int userId,
                                         java.lang.String usrname,
                                         java.lang.String resType,
                                         java.lang.String roomType,
                                         int stayDuration,
                                         java.lang.String mealStatus,
                                         java.lang.String mealType,

                                         java.sql.Time resTime,
                                         int meetingDuration,
                                         boolean addService,
                                         int noOfGuest,
                                         java.lang.String resFor)
        Parameters:
        userId - is the id of user
        usrname, - name of the user
        resType, - reservation type (room, meeting, banquet, restaurant)
        roomType, - type of the room
        stayDuration, - duration to book
        mealStatus, - if meal is included
        mealType, - type of the meal included
        resDate, - date on reservation is made
        resTime, - time at which reservation is made
        meetingDuration, - duration for meeting
        addService, - additional service if required
        noOfGuest, - number of guest
        resFor, - if reservation for breakfast, brunch, lunch, dinner
